summary: I would either purchase a set of rechargable batteries or try another camera.The pictures that we have taken do turn out very well.
(Hadn't so much as TRIED to take a picture!)
I bought this camera for 200 bucks and can say that I am quite satisfied, and somewhat surprised at the quality.
The camera has a good zoom on it, and is very easy to use.
Aside from the card problem, I found the camera not particularly user friendly.
It has been very easy to do so with the bundled Nero software.
This dvd drive is not compatible with USB1.1.
I tried the memorex 3203288 that only cost me around US$80.
I can make CD's again and make value and worth out of my computer again!
I feel that for the money a better center couldn't be found.
I am very happy with the purchase.
I run 100 watts to this speaker and it handles it well.
